description: The Fonna vest is made from luxurious soft, brushed merino knit. Their quality is uncomparable to conventional poly fleece, as it is made from 80% fine merino wool, with all the nice benefits that comes with this natural fiber. It's cut for a regular fit that slips over your base-layer for extra warmth under your ski jacket. Zipped front and chest pockets which will keep your valuables safe during activity.
name: We Norwegians Fonna Wool Fleece Vest - Mens
